ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 109
ygData.msgSnippet: So I m planning on starting an Erudin enchanter.  I ve been going to a lot of sources, studying jewelcraft, etc.  I thought it would be a good time to ask
ygData.messageBody:
So I'm planning on starting an Erudin enchanter. I've been going to a lot
of sources, studying jewelcraft, etc. I thought it would be a good time to
ask opinions of people here where I should spend my first few levels. I
hear the isle we start on is a pit and I should get off it as soon as I can,
but I suppose I need to know if I should just stop at Qeynos hills or keep
going all the way to the Steamfont newbie area? <grin>


Any suggestions would be appreciated. Thanks.
